cookingTips: Mix ingredients until just combined; don't overmix as these cookies can become tough
Flatten cookies slightly with a fork for even cooking and classic peanut butter cookie appearance
Bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes until just set; they continue cooking on the hot baking sheet after removal
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the cook that simplicity in ingredient lists doesn't mean less flavor, and show how to achieve the right cookie texture.
